## RouteConfigOptions.xsrfRequired property

Defines xsrf protection requirements for a route: - true. Requires an incoming POST/PUT/DELETE request to contain `osd-xsrf` header. - false. Disables xsrf protection.

Set to true by default

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
xsrfRequired?: Method extends 'get' ? never : boolean;
```
